description: This is a React component defining a dashboard layout with a mobile menu toggle, overlay, and sidebar.

methods.name: DashboardLayout
methods.description: React functional component that manages the layout of the dashboard, including mobile menu toggling.

methods.name: toggleMobileMenu
methods.description: Function to toggle the mobile menu open/closed state.

methods.name: closeMobileMenu
methods.description: Function to close the mobile menu.
